name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions:
1) Cook pasta until al dente.
2) Fry bacon until crispy.
3) Mix eggs with cheese and pepper.
4) Combine with hot pasta and stir.

name: Beef Stroganoff
instructions:
1) Sauté onions and garlic in butter.
2) Add beef slices and brown them.
3) Stir in mushrooms, cream, salt, and pepper.
4) Simmer for 15 minutes.

name: Chicken Alfredo
instructions:
1) Cook pasta until al dente.
2) Sauté garlic in butter, then add chicken.
3) Stir in cream and cheese.
4) Mix with pasta.

name: Tomato Soup
instructions:
1) Sauté onion, garlic, and carrot.
2) Add tomatoes and simmer.
3) Blend until smooth.
4) Add salt, pepper, and basil.

name: Shrimp Fried Rice
instructions:
1) Cook rice and set aside.
2) Fry shrimp until pink.
3) Scramble eggs, then add vegetables.
4) Mix everything with soy sauce.
